word: I have not seen in years so much poverty as I have seen since I have come to Texas. Brother Moore has had poor health, and he has nothing-- not a cent to get provisions with. We must help that family or they must suffer for the very necessities of life. I have put those flannel sheets [that] you sent me, on his bed. He is now unable to work because of pleurisy. I gave each of the Cornell girls a dress, which they needed very much. I cannot see want and misery and enjoy the comforts of life.
